DisturbanceStorage Class Reference

Class for keeping track of changes in the RoutingMap and restoring them when the changes no longer are valid. More...

#include <DisturbanceStorage.h>

Protected Attributes

  • changedNodes_t m_changedNodes
    Map containing the changed nodes and costs.
  • RoutingMap * m_map
    The map is needed to lookup nodes using the connections.
  • nodesInMultiMap_t m_nodesInMulti
    Multimap containing the from-node id in a multiconnection in first and the connection that affects the multiconnection in second (the ones containing disturbances).

Detailed Description

Class for keeping track of changes in the RoutingMap and restoring them when the changes no longer are valid.

int DisturbanceStorage::rollBackOne (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID
) 
 

Restores the connection from fromnode to tonode to original state.

Parameters:
fromNodeID Id of the node that the connection leads from.
toNodeID Id of the node that the connection leads to.
Returns:

bool  removing
)  [protected]
 

Updates the multiconnections affected by the change at rollback or an addition of changes.

Parameters:
change The previously made change.
removing True if removing, false if adding.

Member Data Documentation

changedNodes_t DisturbanceStorage::m_changedNodes [protected]
 

Map containing the changed nodes and costs.

To be used when expanding the route and adding costs. The first in the pair is the nodeid of the from-node. The second in the pair is the nodeid of the to node.
